title: About
content:
It's a new year at Mackenzie, and there's new fish to fry. From stacked hallways to feral mascots, The Flounder's got you covered with real, important news about the school you know and love.

Read The Flounder because you are a successful student, a leader in your industry, and a respected community member. Stay informed about the local school news.

Check out our content guidelines here and our article writing guidelines here.
